cause.description:
Open Hearts and Helping Hands is an organization whose primary goal is to bring cheer and support to the battered women's and children's shelters of America. By bringing light to the sad surroundings and deeply engraved bad memories that the shelters become infected with Open Hearts and Helping Hands strives to brighten the lives of people who need it most by providing funds for food, toiletries, blankets, furniture, clothes, and anything else that could bring joy to these women and children.
1. The dim conditions of these shelters only reinforce the memories of the traumatic life they are making an effort to leave.
cause.mission: Providing support to battered women's and children's shelters in the US.
cause.name: Open Hearts and Helping Hands
